text: The men's 10,000 metres event at the 2006 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Beijing, China, at Chaoyang Sports Centre on 16 August. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Ibrahim Jeylan ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Joseph Ebuya ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Aadam Ismaeel Khamis ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 16 August {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
